meanings.sent1: She reexplained the math problem to the student who was confused.
meanings.sent2: He reexplained the rules of the game to his friends before they started playing.
meanings.sent3: The teacher reexplained the joke to the class, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The scientist reexplained the theory in a new light, sparking a breakthrough.
meanings.sent5: The coach reexplained the strategy, making it crystal clear to the team.
